title: Sparse modeling approach to the arbitrage-free interpolation of plain-vanilla option prices and implied volatilities. (arXiv:2205.10865v2 [q-fin.PR] UPDATED)
abstract: We present a method for the arbitrage-free interpolation of plain-vanilla option prices and implied volatilities, which is based on a system of integral equations that relates terminal density and option prices. Using a discretization of the terminal density, we write these integral equations as a system of linear equations. We show that the kernel matrix of this system is in general ill-conditioned, so that it can not be solved for the discretized density using a naive approach. Instead, we construct a sparse model for the kernel matrix using the singular value decomposition (SVD), which allows us not only to systematically improve the condition number of the kernel matrix, but also determines the computational effort and accuracy of our method. translated_title: 一种稀疏建模方法用于无套利插值的普通香草期权价格和隐含波动率
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种基于积分方程组的方法，来进行无套利插值的普通香草期权价格和隐含波动率的计算。使用终端密度的离散化，我们将这些积分方程写成线性方程组的形式。我们表明，这个系统的内核矩阵通常很病态，所以不能使用朴素的方法解决离散化密度问题。相反，我们使用奇异值分解（SVD）构建了一个内核矩阵的稀疏模型，它不仅可以系统地改善内核矩阵的条件数，还可以确定我们的方法的计算成本和准确性。为了允许对可能包含套利的实际输入进行处理，我们将线性方程组转化成了一个优化问题，在这个问题中，SVD转换的密度最小化了输入价格和通过选项价格函数得到的价格之间的误差。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于线性方程组和奇异值分解（SVD）的稀疏建模方法，用于计算无套利插值的普通香草期权价格和隐含波动率，可以有效地提高内核矩阵的条件数，并处理实际输入中可能存在套利的情况。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a sparse modeling approach based on linear equations and singular value decomposition (SVD) for computing the arbitrage-free interpolation of plain-vanilla option prices and implied volatilities. It effectively improves the condition number of the kernel matrix and handles arbitrage in realistic inputs.
